title: Changing my Name Suggestion?
body: Im sick of join games and people talking shit about my name, I chose this name because it was meant to reflect some of the stupid people in OCE who like to play {{champion:43}}  as an ADC, but instead if I say to someone that they are being toxic its all "lol thats some bronzelogic" sooooooo... Ive decided to change my name, any suggestions? I like archery soo yea

replies.body:
>play {{champion:43}}  as an ADC

That's legit though.
IKR She has the setup for it! Like ADC Ahri, she excels in crowd-controlling a target while just unloading a tonne of autos on them; with the added bonus of that attack modifier ability!
also wins all trades early due to heal!! people complain about the CC of jinx + leo, imagine nami ad+ leo?????

We should duo.

Legit. I'm not on League atm, but add me. I'll accept.
Pretty sure I had you added at some point.

I don't see you online.

I've sent you a request, meaning we were friends before this.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WwZPmHdY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-31T02:55:56.137+0000)
>
> That's legit though.

No its not. Attack speed AP Karma works, but ADC Karma isn't all that good.
Then again...
I have won as ADC Karma.
ADC Karma with AD Lulu support - gotta try this.

I dislike that people can't be creators of their own names, its quite fun. If it bothers you that much, just change it to something random like a bunch of letters + Numbers (Kiki007, Zek101, bwmb0x) these are all unnoticeable (read; forgettable). If you want meaning to your name try another language like french/german- they sound good. 

You like archery? The Latin word for marksman is peritus arcus, the Greek word for man is Anthropos.  
Try a portmanteau of the two and you get 'peripos' or 'ArcusAnthropos' (Bowman)

You think you have problems?

I'm famous because of that post on the "2015 Kick-off sale".

Nearly every game, "omg it's the guy who posted on Boards".

Changed my name :D Im now know as "WhoNeedsReasons"
BronzeLogic is now a free name

also if your jungler and top is {{champion:114}} and shes like y no gank

and your like WhoNeedsReasons omg im so tired.
Could I get something Fireworks themed too?
